Package org.drasyl.util.protocol

Class UpnpIgdUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drasyl.util.protocol.UpnpIgdUtil
  • public class UpnpIgdUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) Internet Gateway Device-related stuff.
    See Also:
    RFC 6970
